announcements.title: Important for Windows Users: Reinstall Needed
announcements.body: If you’re on Windows, please grab this update from our downloads page instead of in-app update. It’s a quick one-time reinstall to get everything back on track.

announcements.title: New Themes + Gemini Free-Tier Improvements
announcements.body: New color themes are now live in the Settings tab. Huge thanks to u/PrimarchsWrath for the suggestion. We also improved Gemini efficiency so free-tier usage stretches further.
